statements: SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT competitor_name, product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, competitor_name, sale_date FROM pricing_strategies WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT competitor_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_strategies GROUP BY competitor_name;
SELECT id, competitor_name, product_name, price, sale_date FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT competitor_name, product_name, price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE competitor_name = 'Amazon' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, competitor_name, price, sale_date FROM pricing_strategies WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT competitor_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_strategies GROUP BY competitor_name HAVING avg_price > 50 ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM pricing_strategies GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data;
SELECT competitor_name, price FROM competitor_data WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, price, date_updated FROM competitor_data ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, product_id, price FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT sale_id, product_id, units_sold, revenue FROM sales_records WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY competitor_name DESC
SELECT competitor_name, price FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_id = 3
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM competitor_data
SELECT competitor_name, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM competitor_data GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY avg_price DESC
SELECT competitor_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_updated, '%Y-%m-%d') AS updated_date FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_id < 5
SELECT competitor_name, products_sold FROM Competitors;
SELECT total_sales, sales_date FROM SalesRecords ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PricingStrategies WHERE target_market = 'Technology';
SELECT competitor_name, products_sold FROM Competitors WHERE competitor_id = 3;
SELECT strategy_name, pricing_method FROM PricingStrategies ORDER BY strategy_id ASC;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name FROM Competitors ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_market FROM PricingStrategies WHERE pricing_method = 'discount';
SELECT competitor_name, products_sold FROM Competitors WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(products_sold) > 0;
SELECT * FROM SalesRecords WHERE total_sales > 1000 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;

SELECT competitor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales_records FROM Competitors JOIN SalesRecords ON Competitors.competitor_id = SalesRecords.record_id GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY total_sales_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data;
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, product_category, price FROM competitor_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, product_category, price FROM competitor_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, product_category, price FROM competitor_data WHERE price < 100;
SELECT * FROM sales_records WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, product_category, price FROM competitor_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sales_id, customer_id, product_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_records WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_price, previous_price FROM product_prices WHERE current_price < previous_price;
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_id, competitor_name, product_category, price FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY competitor_name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data
SELECT competitor_name, product_name, price FROM competitor_data
SELECT id, competitor_name, timestamp FROM competitor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM historical_sales_records WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, quantity, total_sales FROM historical_sales_records ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY competitor_name ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM competitor_data WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM competitor_data GROUP BY competitor_name HAVING MAX(price) > 500;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, quantity, total_sales FROM historical_sales_records WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT analysis_date, competitor_name, strength, weakness FROM competitor_analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC, competitor_name ASC;
